The proximal radioulnar joint refers to the articulation between the *radial head* as it pivots on the *ulna's radial notch* @jonesProjectFoundations2025.



# Pack position

- Closed:
    - 5&deg; supination
- Open:
    - 70&deg; flexion
    - 35&deg; supination
